title: Will there be Any more Tournaments after OPL finals in Oceania.
body:
Obviously with worlds and promotions tournaments that are going to be taking place. 
Exams also another factor to conclude. 

Really was thinking of something like a Kespa Cup style.  
Since you know the league scene sort of goes dormant for a bit after worlds. 

Is this something we could consider or would it be way too much to handle?.

replies.body: Hi there! We do not have any additional tournaments planned for 2016. I think the long off season is definitely a problem that needs to be solved, but at the same time we've definitely decided to invest our time and resources into the OPL which I think is the right call.
